name: Build-A-Gun
description:
game created for TasGameMakers 2022 game jam - theme was aspirations

Controls:

WASD / Arrow keys to move around, space/ left click to shoot.

In build-a-gun you can draw your ideal gun! You may draw what it looks like, then choose where bullets should come out of as well as where the player should hold it.

The game is played as a top down shooter where you must survive as long as possible. Over time the enemies get stronger and grow in numbers, but you also get stronger along the way. Currently you must restart the game to redesign the gun, but in future you should be able to redesign at any time.

To start, draw your gun using the canvas tools, then click on the bullet/hold points to pick them up and put them where you want on the gun.  Red arrow is bullet point, green is hold point. Then you can start playing!
